ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: The non-technical term we use for how we kill Nag/Vox is gimps . I bring my 49th Rogue to raids. At least half of the people involved in our raids are
ygData.messageBody:
The non-technical term we use for how we kill Nag/Vox is "gimps". I bring my
49th Rogue to raids. At least half of the people involved in our raids are
<53 secondary characters. We almost always have 53+
clerics/shamans/enchanters present to buff us, though, and I usually bring
the bard for pumping mana into the buffing team. You can also use the scales
from Ragefire if you have any clerics working on their epic quest.

>
>My guild can't do Vox or Naggy straight up because almost all of us are
>above level 52. I'm curious if
>anyone can give me some guidance on how level 53+ characters can contribute
>to a Vox/Naggy raid without
>being tossed (or with being tossed, if that's useful). I don't understand
>the mechanics of when someone
>is tossed and when they aren't. We have a couple of small guild allies
>that we could use as front men.
>
>Also, does anyone have links to any good information on taking down the
>Kunark dragons? We haven't done
>any of them yet; everyone keeps saying we have too few high levels (50 over
>level 53 doesn't seem that
>weak to me, but what do I know? We have about 5 level 60s now.)
>
>I'm never getting this epic weapon, we have too many warriors, and two
>Bards in front of me. But it's
>nice to dream.
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk
